name: ExtraHop Reveal(x)
description: This app integrates with your ExtraHop system to gain insight into devices, traffic, and detections in your environment

ingestion_type.description: Type of data to retrieve and ingest

json_object.description: JSON object for on poll action

detection_category.description: Category of detections to retrieve. (Default detection category: 'sec.attack')

detection_status.description: Status of detections to retrieve. (Comma-delimited; leave blank to retrieve detections of any status)

metric_cycle_length.description: Aggregation time interval for retrieved metrics

object_type.description: Object type associated with the API IDs to poll for metrics

object_id.description: API IDs for the objects to poll for metrics (Comma-delimited)

metric_category.description: Category of metrics to retrieve. (See REST API Parameters in the ExtraHop Metric Catalog to find categories)

metric_name.description: Names of metrics to retrieve. (Comma-delimited; see REST API Parameters in the ExtraHop Metric Catalog to find metric names)

bpf.description: Berkeley Packet Filter (BPF) syntax for packet retrieval

limit_bytes.description: Maximum number of return bytes for packet retrieval

limit_search_duration.description: Maximum runtime for packet retrieval. The default unit is milliseconds, but other units can be specified with a unit suffix.

ip1.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this IP address

ip2.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this additional IP address

port1.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this port number

port2.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this additional port number

actions.description: Initiate a connection to the ExtraHop system to validate the asset configuration
Retrieve details and properties for a device
actions.verbose: This action retrieves details about a specified device on the ExtraHop network such as MAC address, DHCP name, discovery time, device role, and device group membership. Learn more about retrieving device information through the ExtraHop REST API.

ip.description: Comma-delimited list of device IP addresses to retrieve details and properties

actions.description: Retrieve a list of peers that communicated with a device
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of all peers that communicated with a specified device within the last N minutes. The peers can be filtered by role and protocols. Specify the device through either the 'ip' or 'eh_api_id' parameter. If both parameters are provided, 'eh_api_id' is the default.

ip.description: IP address of the device from which to search for peers

minutes.description: Amount of lookback data in minutes (default is 30 mins)

peer_role.description: Role to search for on peers

protocol.description: Protocol to search for on peers

eh_api_id.description: REST API ID of the device (default value if 'ip' is also specified)

actions.description: Retrieve a list of protocols observed on a device
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of all protocols that were observed to have communicated on a specified device within the last N minutes. Specify the device through either the 'ip' or 'eh_api_id' parameter. If both parameters are provided, 'eh_api_id' is the default.

ip.description: IP address of the device on which to search for protocols

minutes.description: Amount of lookback data in minutes (default is 30 mins)

eh_api_id.description: REST API ID of the device (default value if 'ip' is also specified)

example_values: DNS, IPv4, LDAP, NTP, SSL, TCP, UDP
Server protocol count: 4, Client protocol count: 7

actions.description: Retrieve a list of devices based on specified search criteria
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of active devices that were discovered on the ExtraHop network within the last N minutes. The 'filter' parameter is applicable only if the value for 'field_type' is set to 'custom_filter'. Learn more about extracting a device list through the ExtraHop REST API. If 'json_object' parameter is provided, it will be prioritized and rest of the parameters will be ignored.

minutes.description: Amount of lookback data in minutes (default is 30 mins)

offset.description: Starting count for the set of results (default is 0)

limit.description: Maximum number of results that can be retrieved

filter.description: JSON query of device search criteria

actions.description: Create a custom device (Reveal(x) Enterprise only)
actions.verbose: This action creates a new custom device on the ExtraHop system from a specified IP address and CIDR block. Learn more about creating a custom device through the ExtraHop REST API. If 'json_object' parameter is provided, it will be prioritized and rest of the parameters will be ignored.

json_object.description: Json object for creating a custom device

ip.description: IP address for the custom device

name.description: Unique name for the custom device

author.description: User that created the custom device

description.description: Description details for the custom device

cidr.description: CIDR block for the custom device

actions.verbose: This action assigns tags to a device on the ExtraHop system. Specify the device through either the 'ip' or 'eh_api_id' parameter. If both parameters are provided, 'eh_api_id' is the default.

ip.description: IP address of the device to tag

eh_api_id.description: REST API ID of the device (default value if 'ip' is also specified

actions.verbose: This action will retrieve the details of the metric based on the given inputs. If 'json_object' parameter is provided, it will be prioritized and rest of the parameters will be ignored.

json_object.description: JSON object for get metrics action

minutes.description: Amount of lookback data in minutes (default is 30 mins)

metric_cycle_length.description: Aggregation time interval for retrieved metrics

object_type.description: Object type associated with the API IDs

metric_category.description: Category of metrics to retrieve. (See REST API Parameters in the ExtraHop Metric Catalog to find categories)

metric_name.description: Names of metrics to retrieve. (Comma-delimited; see REST API Parameters in the ExtraHop Metric Catalog to find metric names)

actions.verbose: This action will retrieve the packets in the form of a pcap file and stored it into the vault. If 'json_object' parameter is provided, it will be prioritized and rest of the parameters will be ignored.

json_object.description: JSON object for get packets action

minutes.description: Amount of lookback data in minutes (default is 30 mins)

bpf.description: Berkeley Packet Filter (BPF) syntax for packet retrieval

limit_bytes.description: Maximum number of return bytes for packet retrieval

limit_search_duration.description: Maximum runtime for packet retrieval. The default unit is milliseconds, but other units can be specified with a unit suffix.

ip1.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this IP address

ip2.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this additional IP address

port1.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this port number

port2.description: Retrieve packets sent to or received by this additional port number

actions.description: Retrieve and ingest of data from the ExtraHop system
actions.verbose: This action ingests detections, metrics, or PCAP data from the ExtraHop system as specified by the asset configuration.

container_count.description: Maximum number of containers to ingest
